CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Avalon GloboCare Corp. (OTCQB: AVCO) is a global intelligent biotech developer and healthcare service provider dedicated to promoting and empowering high impact, transformative cell-based technologies and their clinical applications, as well as healthcare facility management through its core platforms, namely 'Avalon Cell' and 'Avalon Rehab.
